Wod.title: Wod
Wod.description: Represents a Workout of the Day (WOD) in CrossFit.

id.description: Unique identifier for the WOD entity.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this WOD.

name.description: Name or title of the WOD.

description.description: Detailed description of the WOD, including exercises, sets, and reps.

type.description: Type of WOD (e.g., AMRAP, For Time, EMOM).

imageUrl.description: Data URI of the image of the whiteboard WOD.

imageHint.description: A one or two-word hint for finding a relevant stock photo.

date.description: Date when the WOD was created, in yyyy-MM-dd format.

definition.description: Stores WODs created by a specific user. Access is restricted to the owner (user identified by userId).
